name.baseName: Veterinary cooking extracts ; Chinese medicine tablets ; Extraction (without using organic solvents) ; less than 200 t - Chinese herbal pieces/a; NESPS2
兽用煮提产物 ; 中药饮片 ; 提取（不使用有机溶剂） ; 小于200吨中药饮片/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工艺用于生产兽用中药片，通过烹饪提取法但未使用有机溶剂，适用于年产不足200吨的中药饮片操作。此外，提供的数据包括各种末端污染物管理技术，专门针对废水污染物的处理，如化学需氧量(COD)、氨氮、总磷和有机结合氮。这些技术包括好氧和厌氧生物处理，有时与物理化学方法相结合，以确保通过有效的污染减排符合环境标准。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,三级代码275.0文件，在完整版文件中第3116页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为中药饮片，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学处理法，其效率为94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisAerobic biological treatment + physical chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是好氧生物处理法+物理化学处理法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
